Review.Contenu: The VDR was initially frustratingly slow, but got continually better over time (the deal lasted over a year). The real problem was the service and support; we had two major problems with Firmroom.(i) We had two deals simultaneously with Firmroom and one time, one client took more than 10 (ten) days to pay the VDR provider. Firmroom adopted a gangster attitude and decided to shut down both VDRs. This is ridiculous because both our deals had nothing to do with each other. Our clients were responsible for payment of their respective VDRs, not us, but Firmroom decided to pressure us -the advisor- by shutting down its service to ALL our clients. This shutdown lasted until the other client paid the invoice. It was extremely unprofessional and almost cost us (and our other client) deal.(ii) To close the deal, our client required pendrives as back-up of the VDR (which is standard). Even though Firmroom was notified with more than a month of time, they were incapable of getting the pendrives to us (3 months after the request they still haven't arrived, they have been 'in route' for almost 2 months, the deal is closed by now). In the end we had to download a special software and encrypt the pendrives ourselves. Pathetic.Going forward, we will NEVER recommend Firmroom to a client.
Good 14 day trial. Nowhere near good or efficient enough to command the monthly price point when other competitors have better data rooms, functionality and protection
Good basic data room but lacks some items such as limited notifications and sending requests.
Files would sometimes not open requiring full downloads. Index of content did not show all files available.

Review.Titre: Customer service itself is great but…
Review.Contenu: Customer service itself is great but many of the emails from you go to investors’ spam boxes and low priority boxes and you don’t allow sending a link. So in some ways it’s less effective than free solutions involving Google sheets etc
There should be a commenting feature on documents. Value for money is poor compared to what is available now as alternatives in the market.
The system simply worked although have my email so darkly plastered  over the data did obscure it a little.
not applicable
Easy to use, intuitive interface

Review.Titre: The product works as advertised and…
Review.Contenu: The product works as advertised and with good support and follow up
The data room is user friendly I highly recommend it. It would be great if we can get better prices.

Review.Titre: All data room features for fraction of the money
Review.Contenu: FirmRoom is hands down the best data room that I have ever used. It has got all the features that make for smooth diligence. Document viewer is fast, which makes you want to actually open and work with it everyday. The data room itself is very easy to navigate and pricing is very reasonable, and I truly believe it offers the best value for money in the current data room market. Overall, I highly recommend FirmRoom to anyone looking for secure, user-friendly, and feature-packed data room software.

Review.Titre: SAFELY SECURE AND SHARE YOUR DATA
Review.Contenu: Setting up and maintaining the data room was a simple and easy process. It required little time or experience and the data room provided a safe and secure method for sharing sensitive data. I would highly recommend the data room and I would gladly use the service again

Effective and easy to use. I was easily able to manage new doc uploads and redactions which seems like a pain on other platforms. The support team also seemed quick to respond and modified features fast

Review.Titre: Adoption speed was great and quick
Review.Contenu: Adoption speed was great and quick, for set-up and invited users.  Easy to manage groups, various folders, content access, unloads and downloads of data.

Review.Titre: Very simple to get up and running.
Review.Contenu: Very simple to get up and running.Excellent value. Particularly the individual room visualisation is quite good - easy to see/check what each investor has access too.

Review.Titre: User-friendly VDR at a much more…
Review.Contenu: User-friendly VDR at a much more reasonable rate than other data rooms. We found the self-sign up process very convenient.

Review.Titre: Best Platform with Most Useful Features
Review.Contenu: Super user-friendly, with a lot of features other providers do not offer. Team is great to work with and very responsive. Definitely platform of choice

Review.Titre: FirmRoom is easy to manage and one of…
Review.Contenu: FirmRoom is easy to manage and one of the best VDRs in the market! What I really like is their permission settings and centralized storage.

Review.Titre: An excellent data room at a fair price
Review.Contenu: FirmRoom truly made our lives easier. Typically used FirmRoom software to run and manage documents. We analyzed the market and this particular product against their key competitors like Ideals, Datasite and Intralinks, and found FirmRoom to offer comparable product features at competitive pricing. The interface is extremely intuitive and we love it. Overall 10/10 with a competitive price and an easy-to-use platform.
No problems. Easy to use and get around and share info - intuitive and straight forward
It's been easy to use and easy to bring in just the new files that were uploaded into the VDR.
Firmroom is easy to navigate and a sufficient document sharing tool.
Timely, clear updates.  Easy to track changes.Well done data site.
Great platform
Document placement, access and sharing.
